required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Extension to CQTI571A2102 to Evaluate Long-term Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Imatinib in Severe Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH)
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Extension Study to CQTI571A2102 to Evaluate the Long-term Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of QTI571 (Imatinib) in the Treatment of Severe Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: This study was an extension to study CQTI571A2102 and was to evaluate the long-term safety, tolerability and efficacy of QTI571 (imatinib) in severe pulmonary arterial hypertension patients.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Novartis discontinued the development of imatinib in PAH due to requirement of regulatory authorities for additional data to secure marketing approval in PAH.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients With Adverse Events, Serious Adverse Events and Deaths
primary_outcome.description: Adverse event monitoring was conducted throughout the trial.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Six Minute Walk Distance (6MWD)

arm_group.description: Participants received 200 mg or 400 mg every day (qd) based on their highest tolerated dose in CQTI571A2102 (NCT01392469).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who completed in CQTI571A2102 clinical trial including all Study Completion assessments at the end of study visit met the eligibility criteria for that study and did not meet withdrawal criteria for safety reasons during study conduct
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) < 45%
- Patients with thrombocytopenia, platelet count < 50 x109/L (50 x 103/ÂµL).
- Patients with uncontrolled systemic arterial hypertension, systolic pressure > 160 mmHg or diastolic pressure > 90 mmHg.
- Patients with a QTcF > 450 ms for males and > 470 ms for females in the absence of right bundle branch block.
Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

group.title: QTI571
group.description: Participants received 200 mg or 400 mg every day (qd) based on their highest tolerated dose in CQTI571A2102 (NCT01392469).

group.description: Participants received 200 mg or 400 mg qd based on their highest tolerated dose in CQTI571A2102.

outcome.title: Number of Patients With Adverse Events, Serious Adverse Events and Deaths
outcome.description: Adverse event monitoring was conducted throughout the trial.
outcome.population: Safety Analysis Set: The safety analysis set included all participants who received at least one dose of study drug during the extension and had at least one post-baseline safety assessment.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The terms and conditions of Novartis' agreements with its investigators may vary. However, Novartis does not prohibit any investigator from publishing. Any publications from a single-site are postponed until the publication of the pooled data (i.e., data from all sites) in the clinical trial or disclosure of trial results in their entirety.
